choice1.consequence: You enter the mysterious cave, the air cool and damp.

choice2.consequence: You decide to set up camp, hoping to explore in the morning.
choice2.text: Set up camp for the night

choice3.consequence: Delving deeper into the cave, the sounds of an unknown creature echo around you.

choice4.consequence: You carefully climb down the rocky decline, finding an ancient cavern below.

choice5.consequence: You retrace your steps, exiting the cave to the safety of daylight.

choice6.consequence: As daylight breaks, you're greeted by the sights and sounds of the unknown forest.

choice7.consequence: You decide to rest until morning, a cautious yet wise choice.

segment1.narrative: Standing at the edge of a dark forest, you spot a shadowy cave entrance.

segment2.narrative: Inside the cave, the path forks into a deeper passage or a precarious descent.

segment3.narrative: Night passes quietly. Morning brings a choice: explore the unknown forest or return to the cave.

segment4.narrative: The further you venture, the more alien the cave becomes. Strange, bioluminescent fungi light your path.

segment5.narrative: Below, you discover an ancient underground lake, its waters clear and mysterious.

segment6.narrative: The forest is alive with sounds. Sunlight filters through thick foliage, revealing paths not taken.
